pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Hierarchical Poisson Models for Multiple Grouped Outcomes with Clustering // Bayesian hierarchical methods for the detection of differences in rates of related outcomes for multiple treatments for clustered observations (Carragher et al. (2020) doi:10.1002/sim.8563). This software was developed for the Precision Drug Theraputics: Risk Prediction in Pharmacoepidemiology project as part of a Rutherford Fund Fellowship at Health Data Research (UK), Medical Research Council (UK) award reference MR/S003967/1 (https://gtr.ukri.org/). Principal Investigator: Raymond Carragher.
